mapper.select: SELECT acct_no, bank_cd, bal, ib_type, acct_dv, loan_nm, acct_nick_nm, agmt_amt, pyat_amt, pyat_dt, new_dt, expi_dt, repay_way, cont_rt, dpsv_dv, loan_kind, cltr_ctt, int_payt_dt, curr_cd, real_amt FROM account

SELECT acct_no, bank_cd, bal, ib_type, acct_dv, loan_nm, acct_nick_nm, agmt_amt, pyat_amt, pyat_dt, new_dt, expi_dt, repay_way, cont_rt, dpsv_dv, loan_kind, cltr_ctt, int_payt_dt, curr_cd, real_amt FROM account WHERE acct_no=#{acctNo}
